articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Microsoft lays off another 650 from gaming division - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft is laying off around 650 employees in its gaming division on Thursday, according to a memo sent to employees.
articles.content: Microsoft is laying off around 650 employees from its gaming division, according to an internal memo shared online by IGN. The latest cuts come eight months after the company laid off 1,900 in its ga… [+772 chars]
